titles.title: Canadian Children's Book Centre Collection - Metadata Records

descriptions.description: This collection includes files representing Canadian Children's Book Centre titles: A full extract of the CCBCC collection from the University of Alberta as of February 2018 (14,433 records); an extract of CCBCC titles added to the University of Alberta collection in spring 2017 (626 records); an extract of CCBCC titles added to the University of Alberta collection in fall 2017 (211 records); a full extract of the CCBCC collection from the University of Alberta as of Feb. 2016 (13,009 records); an extract of CCBCC titles added to the University of Alberta collection from Feb. 27th - Oct. 31st 2016 (393 records); an extract of CCBCC titles added to the University of Alberta collection from Nov. 1st 2016 - March 20th 2017 (258 records); a full extract of the CCBCC collection from the University of Alberta as of March 2017 (13,650 records); an extract of CCBCC titles added to the University of Alberta collection in fall 2018 (432 records); a full extract of the CCBCC collection from the University of Alberta as of May 31, 2019 (15,343 records); an extract of CCBCC titles added to the University of Alberta collection in spring 2019 (413 records); a full extract of the CCBCC titles from the University of Alberta as of August 28, 2019 (15,751 records). Format of all files: MARC
